name: Homepage functionality
description: As a user, I should be able to see Home page of HeartBingo and verify visibility of different menu options

children.name: User should be able to see Home Page of Virgin Games and verify links visible
Given I am on Home Page
Then I verify that the homepage is visible
And I verify that Login link is displayed
And I verify that Signup link is displayed
Then I verify that Header Menu is displayed
User should be able to see all navigation menu options
Given I am on Home Page
Then I verify that the homepage is visible
And I should see below navigation menu options
User should be able to see all navigation menu options
User should be able to see all navigation menu options
Given I am on Home Page
Then I verify that the homepage is visible
When I enter valid email "Abcdxyz@gmail.com" and password "Abcd@1234"
